main.title: Stepan Fedyanov Frontend Developer
main.about_text: I have been working in frontend development since 2019. For two years, I worked as a freelancer, participated in the development of large projects, as well as the enhancement and refactoring of existing solutions for clients. In my free time, I enjoy sports and reading.

education.1: CS50's Web Programming with Python and JavaScript

tasks.2: Provided technical support for websites over several months and beyond
tasks.3: Worked on UI development and UX research
